mapper.insert: insert into st_user_order( user_id, area_id, group_id, address_id, accept_date, status_cd ) values ( #{userId}, #{areaId}, #{groupId}, #{addressId}, now(), #{statusCd} )
mapper.select: select user_order_id as userOrderId, user_id as userId, area_id as areaId, group_id as groupId, address_id as addressId, accept_date as acceptDate, status_cd as statusCd from st_user_order where user_order_id = #{userOrderId}
